affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "COL3" );

	task ( "warn1" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/col3/peterson/warn01.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "COL3_034" );
	}

	do ( "warn1" );
	wait ( 4000.000 );
	wait ( 3000.000 );
	use ( "go_dist_check2" );
}
